\newcounter{lineoffset}
\newcommand\LineText[4][above]{%
  \pgfmathsetcounter{lineoffset}{#3}
  \coordinate (l\thelineoffset) at ($(#2)!\thelineoffset/(#3+1)$);
  \node[rotate=-90,above] at (l\thelineoffset) {#4};
}
\newcommand\LineHalo[3][2pt]{%
  \draw[line width=\pgfkeysvalueof{/tikz/line halo},decorate,decoration={brace,amplitude=#1},shift={(0.1,0)}]  
    ([yshift=-#2]#1.north east) -- ([yshift=-#2]#2.south east) node [midway,anchor=east,font=\footnotesize] 
    {\strut\pgfkeysvalueof{/tikz/line halo distance}};  
  \draw[shift={(0.2,0)},line width=\pgfkeysvalueof{/tikz/line halo}]  ([yshift=-#2]#1.north east) -- ([yshift=-#2]#2.south east);   
  \coordinate (l\thelineoffset) at ($(#2)!\thelineoffset/(#3+1)$);  
}
\newcommand\LineBottomBorder[2][2pt]{%
  \draw[line width=\pgfkeysvalueof{/tikz/line halo},draw=white,shift={(0.2,0)}]  
    (#1.north) -- (#2.south) node [midway,anchor=north,font=\footnotesize] 
    {\strut\pgfkeysvalueof{/tikz/line halo distance}};  
  \draw[shift={(0.2,0)},line width=\pgfkeysvalueof{/tikz/line halo}]  (#1.north) -- (#2.south);   
  \coordinate (l\thelineoffset) at ($(#2)!\thelineoffset/(#3+1)$);  
}
\newcommand\LineTopBorder[2][4pt]{%
  \draw[line width=\pgfkeysvalueof{/tikz/line halo},draw=white,shift={(0.2,0)}]  
    (#1.south) -- (#2.north) node [midway,anchor=west,font=\footnotesize] 
    {\strut\pgfkeysvalueof{/tikz/line halo distance}};  
  \draw[shift={(0.2,0)},line width=\pgfkeysvalueof{/tikz/line halo}]  (#1.south) -- (#2.north);   
  \coordinate (l\thelineoffset) at ($(#2)!\thelineoffset/(#3+1)$);  
}

\pgfmathdeclarefunction{intStep}{2}{%
\begingroup%
\pgfmathparse{#1+(#2-#1)/int(#2/#1)}\pgfmath@smuggleone\pgfmathresult\endgroup}

\pgfmathdeclarefunction{fraction}{2}{%
\begingroup%
\pgfmathsetmacro\pgfmath@tempa{(#2-#1)*int(#1/#2)}%
\pgfmathsetmacro\pgfmath@tempb{#1}%
\pgfmathsetmacro\pgfmath@tempc{\pgfmath@tempa/#2}%
\pgfmathsetmacro\pgfmath@tempd{(#1-1)/#2}%
\pgfmath@returnone{\pgfmath@tempa-\pgfmath@tempb\pgfmath@tempc\pgfmath@tempd}%
\pgfmath@smuggleone\pgfmathresult\endgroup}

\begin{tikzpicture}[scale=1, every node/.style={scale=1}]
\tikzstyle{wires}=[thick, gray]
\tikzstyle{input}=[nillified,cyan]
\tikzstyle{output}=[nillified,red]
\tikzstyle{arrow}=[-,>=stealth',thick]
\tikzstyle{nnLine}=[-,>=stealth',thick]
\tikzstyle{cpmLine}=[->,>=stealth',thick]

\matrix[row sep=0cm,column sep=0cm] {
    % Input nodes
    \node[input] (input1) {$\scriptstyle\bullet\scriptstyle$}; &
    \node[input] (input2) {$\scriptstyle\bullet\scriptstyle$}; &
    \node[input] (input3) {$\scriptstyle\bullet\scriptstyle$}; \\
    % Hidden nodes
    \node[nnLine,draw=blue] (hidden1) at (2.5, 0.3) {$\scriptstyle\bullet\scriptstyle$}; &
    \node[nnLine,draw=blue] (hidden2) at (6.0, 0.3) {$\scriptstyle\bullet\scriptstyle$}; &
    \node[nnLine,draw=blue] (hidden3) at (9.0, 0.3) {$\scriptstyle\bullet\scriptstyle$}; \\
    % Output nodes
    \node[output] (output1) {$\scriptstyle\bullet\scriptstyle$} &
    \node[output] (output2) {$\scriptstyle\bullet\scriptstyle$} &
    \node[output] (output3) {$\scriptstyle\bullet\scriptstyle$}; \\
    % Error signals
    \node[] (error1) {} ;
    &
    \node[] (error2) {} ;
    &
    \node[] (error3) {} ; \\
    % Lines behind the nodes
    \draw[wires] (input1) -- ++(2,0); &
    \draw[wires] (input2) -- ++(2,0); &
    \draw[wires] (input3) -- ++(2,0); \\
    \draw[nnLine] (hidden1) -- ++(0.5,0); &
    \draw[nnLine] (hidden2) -- ++(0.5,0); &
    \draw[nnLine] (hidden3) -- ++(0.5,0); \\
    \draw[cpmLine] (output1) -- ++(0.5,0) ; &
    \draw[cpmLine] (output2) -- ++(0.5,0) ; &
    \draw[cpmLine] (output3) -- ++(0.5,0) ; \\
    & \node[text width=5em,text centered,font=\bfseries\large, draw=green!50!yellow] (correction) {Correction}; ; \\
    % Background nodes
    \node[draw=gray, dashed, fit=(input1) (input2) (input3) (hidden3) (hidden3), inner sep=0.75cm] (input box) {}; &
    \node[draw=gray, dashed, fit=(output1) (output2) (output3) (hidden3), inner sep=0.75cm] (output box) {}; ; \\
    % Background nodes
    \node[draw=gray, dashed, fit=(input1) (input2) (input3) (hidden1), inner sep=0.75cm] (input box) {}; &
    \node[draw=gray, dashed, fit=(output2) (output3) (hidden1), inner sep=0.75cm] (output box) {}; ; \\
};

% Draw inputs and error signals. This is auto-inserted,
% and is disabled for most of the nodes by making it gray.
\begin{scope}[on background layer]
\foreach \nnLine/\anchor in {%
  input1/above,
  input2/below,
  input3/above,
  hidden1/above,
  hidden2/below,
  hidden3/above}
  \draw[arrow] (\nnLine |- input box.\anchor) -- (\nnLine) ;

\foreach \nnLine/\anchor in {%
  hidden1/above,
  hidden2/below,
  hidden3/below}
  \draw[arrow] (\nnLine |- output box.\anchor) -- (\nnLine) ;

\draw[arrow] (error1) -- (input box.west)
  node [midway, left] {$\scriptstyle\mathrm{Im} \hspace{1mm} \mathrm{Re}$};
\draw[arrow] (error2) -- (input box.west)
  node [midway, left, pos=0.25] {$\hspace{2mm} \mathrm{Im} \hspace{1mm} \mathrm{Re}$};
\draw[arrow] (error3) -- (input box.west)
  node [midway, left, pos=0.35] {$\hspace{1mm} \mathrm{Re} \hspace{1mm} \mathrm{Im}$};
\end{scope}

\begin{scope}[on background layer]
\foreach \nnLine/\anchor in {%
  hidden1/above,
  hidden2/below,
  hidden3/below}
  \node[fill=white,rounded corners,fit=(hidden1) (hidden2) (hidden3), inner sep=0.5cm, label=\anchor:{\scriptsize\tt Time}] (node-\nnLine) {};

\foreach \output/\anchor in {%
  output1/below,
  output2/below,
  output3/right}
  \node[fill=white,rounded corners,fit=(output1) (output2) (output3), inner sep=0.5cm, label=\anchor:{\scriptsize\tt Correlation}] (node-\output) {};

\foreach \nnLine/\anchor in {%
  cpmi-1/above,
  cpmi-2/above,
  cpmi-3/right}
  \node[fill=white,rounded corners,fit=(node-\nnLine), label=\anchor:{\scriptsize\tt Cycle}](node-\nnLine') {};

\foreach \output/\anchor in {%
  cpmi-1/below,
  cpmi-2/right,
  cpmi-3/below}
  \node[fill=white,rounded corners,fit=(node-\output), label=\anchor:{\scriptsize\tt Storage}](node-\output') {};
\end{scope}
\end{tikzpicture}

\end{document}
